product_name: Patagonia Ultralight Down Hoody Jacket - Men's
long_description: On alpine ascents when both weight and warmth are critical, the men's Patagonia Ultralight Down Hoody is essential. Its premium 800-fill-power goose down delivers superb warmth at a mere 9 oz. Nylon ripstop shell fabric is the toughest, lightest-weight fabric Patagonia has ever used for down garments. Deluge(R) durable water repellent finish helps bead up light precipitation. Premium 800-fill-power European goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Variegated channel construction stabilizes insulation and allows the use of less down, creating an elegant, low-profile jacket. Low-profile hood and slim, thermally efficient silhouette seal in warmth. Zippered handwarmer pockets; 1 zippered chest pocket. Drawcord hem seals in warmth. Patagonia Ultralight Down Hoody for men can be worn alone or layered under a shell for extra weather protection. Stuff sack included.
short_description: On alpine ascents when both weight and warmth are critical, the men's Patagonia Ultralight Down Hoody is essential. Its premium 800-fill-power goose down delivers superb warmth at a mere 9 oz.
